definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: Opening the door in an emergency will automatically  inflate the evacuation slides.
sentences.chinese: 打開緊急出口的門會自動充氣逃離滑梯。

sentences.english: After killing a soldier, Christophe fled the country.
sentences.chinese: 克利斯朵夫在殺死一個士兵後逃離了這個國家。

sentences.english: After three years, Deborah tried to break off the relationship and escape from Joshua.
sentences.chinese: 三年後，黛博拉試圖結束這段關係，逃離約夏的掌控。

sentences.english: They hoped to obtain exit visas here and escaped to the New World At first, Rick can't forgive that Ilsa's gone back on[3] her word.
sentences.chinese: 他們希望能在這裏得到出境證後逃離到美洲新大陸去。

sentences.english: A prisoner was attempting to escape from a tower.
sentences.chinese: 一個囚犯企圖逃離關押他的塔。

sentences.english: Then he wanted to escape from there but tripped over a coil of rope.
sentences.chinese: 然後他想逃離那裏但被一卷繩索絆倒了。

sentences.english: Horses are herded to safety away from the volcanic cloud.
sentences.chinese: 成羣的馬匹正飛奔逃離火山熔岩灰霧。

sentences.english: Fleeing the great flock that Destiny has folded.
sentences.chinese: 逃離了被命運圈起的巨大的羊羣。

sentences.english: Black mambas are shy and will almost always seek to escape when confronted.
sentences.chinese: 黑曼巴容易受驚，通常遇到時它們會尋求逃離。

sentences.english: Aisha fled to escape beatings and other abuse.
sentences.chinese: 阿伊莎想要逃離暴力和虐待。

sentences.english: The third group is avoiding condition.
The number of corrupt officials fleeing China reflects the government's serious attitude about the crackdown on corruption.
sentences.chinese: 逃離中國的貪官數量反映了政府打擊貪腐的嚴正態度。

sentences.english: Then Jacob had to run away from home to live within his uncle.
sentences.chinese: 雅各只好逃離自己的家，到舅舅家去住。

sentences.english: Most of the North Koreans we spoke with said they were fleeing poverty and food shortages.
sentences.chinese: 大多數北韓人都說他們在逃離貧困和食物短缺。

sentences.english: He isn't on the run from the Cobol Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 他也並非在逃離柯伯爾公司的追殺。

sentences.english: Piet? Oh, the guy who escaped with us.
sentences.chinese: 噢，那個和我們一起逃離的傢伙。

definition: to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
in (some place)/to be in (adversity, a difficult situation, danger, turmoil etc)/to find oneself in/placed in/surrounded by
to return to one's home country
to break away from/to cast off (old ideas etc)/to get rid of/to break away (from)/to break out (of)/to free oneself from/to extricate oneself
to be far from/to keep away from
